title: Product docs + high-level delivery plan surfaces
scope: Define the generated docs surfaces that explain governance, runbooks, and delivery plan.
Ensure docs are generated from templates and reflect canonical JSON sources.
Do not add hand-written Markdown; templates only.
acceptance: Docs templates cover navigation, runbooks (intent flow, audit/close, requirements), and delivery plan.
`npm run generate` renders docs with generated frontmatter and consistent links.
Docs are concise and actionable for contributors (how to create/audit/close intents).

deliverables.title: Generated docs for roadmap, runbooks, and navigation
acceptance: Templates exist for navigation + runbooks + delivery plan and are included in generation.
Docs describe repeatable flows (create/audit/close) and governance rules.
evidence: `npm run generate` produces `docs/` with generated frontmatter and updated content.

subtasks.title: Define navigation + quick reference docs templates.
done_when: Navigation templates link to key runbooks and governed surfaces.
Quick reference includes core commands and status model.

subtasks.title: Define runbooks for intent workflow (create/audit/close) and requirements management.
done_when: Runbooks are template-driven and explain repeatable flows.
Runbooks cover requirements splitting, size limits, and close gate behavior.

subtasks.title: Ensure docs generation includes all templates and produces consistent links.
done_when: `npm run generate` renders docs for all templates with generated frontmatter.
